title: Haunted by the Legacy Client
body: I just had to reinstall league of legends after a hard drive failure, and, downloading from the website left me with this popping up every time i run league. I would rather have it just skip to the login screen, like it should. Any p**o**inters?

replies.body: The current installer still starts with the legacy client, but it's unusable until it's updated to the newer version.  You'll need to continue the update to proceed onwards to the most recent patch.  Let me know if that clears things up!
It's updated. I just can't log in during new updates as they come. I have to wait like I used to, just like a year ago.

You should see the updated client if you're updated to the current patch. Does nothing happen if you select Launch?  If you're still seeing this launch screen, then something might be preventing your game files from grabbing the necessary files.  Try out the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League as added as an exception and get in game.
